# 2015 KBS Drama Awards

The 2015 KBS Drama Awards (), presented by Korean Broadcasting System (KBS), took place on December 31, 2015 in Yeouido, Seoul. It was hosted by Jun Hyun-moo, Park Bo-gum and Kim So-hyun.
